name: bv-stack-manager
title: BV Stack Manager
description: Manage BV stack services - start, stop, and restart individual services or the entire stack
author: scottcarey

commands.name: index
commands.title: Manage BV Services
commands.description: View and control all BV stack services

commands.name: start-all
commands.title: Start All BV Services
commands.description: Start all BV stack services at once

commands.name: stop-all
commands.title: Stop All BV Services
commands.description: Stop all BV stack services at once

commands.name: status
commands.title: BV Stack Status
commands.description: Show quick status of all services

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
